job_history.work_description: Prepares necessary adjusting journal entries and period end financial statements. Executes core financial processes, including vendor setup and payment, operational expenses, administration of bank accounts and account reconciliations. Processes journal entries and performs accounting corrections to ensure accurate records. Strengthened financial management processes to bring errors to near-zero in reporting, payroll administration and general bookkeeping. Prepares governmental reports in compliance with strict standards.

Provided excellent customer care by responding to requests, assisting with product selection and handling ordering functions. Managed deposits, withdrawals, transfers and check cashing; verified customer identification, signature and balance information; processes loan payments; and opened/closed accounts. Ensured compliance with banking policies and audit procedures; maintained and balanced cash drawers on a daily basis. Overlooked ATM balances, refilled cash as needed and ensured the system is in good working order. Assessed caller accounts to determine member benefits, identify service needs and resolve issues.

Reconciled cash drawer at start and end of each shift, accounting for errors and resolving discrepancies. Mentored new team members on POS system operation, customer service strategies and sales goals. Completed sales in excess of $10,000 with near-zero error rate using POS system. Organized and reported on financial information to document payment histories and assist with sound financial accounting. Completed tasks quickly and handled multiple responsibilities at the same time.

skills.name: Accounting
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in accounting processes, including preparing financial statements, journal entries, and account reconciliations, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Financial Management
skills.explanation: Strengthened financial management processes to bring errors to near-zero in reporting, payroll administration, and general bookkeeping, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Financial Reporting
skills.explanation: Prepares governmental reports in compliance with strict standards, suggesting strong proficiency in financial reporting.

skills.name: Payroll Administration
skills.explanation: Involved in payroll administration, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Provided excellent customer care by responding to requests, assisting with product selection, and handling ordering functions, indicating a solid level of proficiency in customer service.

skills.name: Cash Handling
skills.explanation: Managed cash drawers, processed transactions, and reconciled cash discrepancies, showing a solid working proficiency in cash handling.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Mentored new team members on POS system operation, customer service strategies, and sales goals, indicating some practical experience in leadership.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Completed tasks quickly and handled multiple responsibilities at the same time, showing some practical experience in time management.
